TextFlow.header: 使用能展示报告不同部分的词语

p.span: The purpose/aim of this report is to…; This report aims to…
This report aims to examine the quality of sports facilities for teenagers in our area.
I visited…; I asked 10 students to…; We examined/looked at (e.g. several centres); I conducted a survey (of)…
I asked 30 students and 5 teachers to fill in/complete a questionnaire about the sports centres.
According to my survey…; We found that, on the whole…; Overall, people preferred…; 50% of those surveyed said that…
50% of the students surveyed said that they rarely use the sports centres.
From the evidence, I conclude that…; In conclusion... The research shows/demonstrates that…
My research shows that teenagers would use the sports centres more if they were in a better state.
It is recommended that…; We recommend/suggest that…; The best solution is/would be to…; If we do A, we will see B…
The best solution would be to invest more in these centres.
I recommend/suggest that the council should invest more money in these centres.
